summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2377, for the improvement of Rainier Avenue from 39th Avenue South to 57th Avenue South, and 57th Avenue South from Rainier Avenue to Fletcher Street, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same, under Ordinance No. 24760 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
